title: Update selected pricing range text to “$51 - $200”

requirements.text: Update ONLY the selected element at XPath /html[1]/body[1]/div[1]/div[1]/main[1]/section[5]/div[1]/div[2]/div[1]/div[2]/div[2]/div[2 so that its displayed text matches exactly: "$51 - $200".
acceptanceCriteria: In the Pricing section, the selected "Minimum Investment" value renders exactly as "$51 - $200" (including spacing around the hyphen).
No other text elements outside the selected XPath are modified as part of this change.

constraints: Apply the change ONLY to the element identified by XPath /html[1]/body[1]/div[1]/div[1]/main[1]/section[5]/div[1]/div[2]/div[1]/div[2]/div[2]/div[2.
Use English for any user-facing text.
nonGoals: Do not change other plan ranges (e.g., "$10 - $50" or "$201 - $1000") unless explicitly requested in a separate instruction.
Do not modify backend plan data or schemas as part of this UI-only text change.
